class_notes: Previous dance experience is NOT required. This course is an improvisational form that does not adhere to a specific dance genre/methodology.
course_description: This class will introduce students with minimal to no dance experience, to the fundamentals of dance improvisation as a method of discovering movement potential, and as an entry point for choreographic exploration.
sections: Class Nbr: 4197, Section #: 1, Type: PE, Campus: OXF, Meets: TTh 1-2:15p, Instructor: A. Abarca, Status: Open
